title: PERFORM(HER)
creator: Catherine Jennifer Andreas
Description: This project is an attempt to represent the mind of many women. The societal pressure, the standard on HOW to be a woman as if existing as one is not good enough. and sometimes, it can feel like we're in a sh*tshow - like a circus. People come & go to watch & leave, but we always have to give our 100% and meet different expectations every single time for everyone but ourselves.\nAnd even when the audience isn't there, when the circus has closed, their presence have engraved in our brains.

title: BLOOM
creator: Azahrah Nayyara
Description: It is about creating yourself trough your experiences .Being surrounded by great artists made me question my own style, both in art and in life. But looking back, I see how far Iâ€™ve come. Everyone has their own journey, and mine is about embracing growth and discovering myself at my own pace.

title: Biru Tenang
creator: Abbytrisha Manurung
Description: Having spent some of my childhood years living in a coastal city, I have always been mesmerized by the duality of waves- ethereal yet also dangerous at the same time. This artwork represents the feelings and nostalgia I have towards ocean waves.

title: Discarded
creator: Alexandra Hillary Agustine
Description: My artwork is about two royals living together in a tower, similar like Rapunzel's tower. They both were rich but the king has a big obsession with the moon. He would always worship it every night without sleep. It made the wife feel unwanted and left behind. The king believed that the moon is an undefeatable God and without it human life would be meaningless and perish to its very feet. He was so devoted in which he believed he is the servant of the divine Gods. His greed and selfishness had no bounds when it comes to power. He would do anything to gain strength even if it costs ones life. One night, during his wife's slumber. He decided to throw his beloved off the tower, a noble sacrifice was necessary in his eyes to gain more power and control. But in reality, he only lost a piece of him.

title: Reycle Robot vs Waste Monster
creator: Zahran Yuarmi Ramadhan
Description: karya yang menggambarkan "Robot daur ulang bertarung melawan monster limbah" ini adalah simbol keresahan saya terhadap sampah yang menumpuk dan tak terolah di Bumi, berubah menjadi limbah kotor yang mencemari lingkungan. Melalui karya ini, saya ingin mengajak orang-orang untuk lebih peduli terhadap lingkungan dengan mendaur ulang sampah.

title: Sculpture/Prop
creator: Angellica Lian
Description: Pada dasarnya manusia pasti memiliki 2 emosi yang berbeda yang tidak akan pernah hilang/ lepas dari kehidupan, namun hidup harus berjalan. Maka saya buat patung orang tetap berdiri tegak walaupun mengalami masa sulit dan senang.

title: The Mirrorball
creator: Joanne Clarissa Kurniawan
Description: karya saya mengangkat tema hedonisme dimana saya membuat sebuah instalasi & performance art berupa mirrorball sebagai simbol dari aksi hedon layaknya di tempat diskotik

title: In Pursuit
creator: Kevin Christover
alt: A woman working until morning in her comfy room
Description: A woman working until morning in her comfy room

title: Ingin Bebas - Ajie Pramudita
creator: Bonaventura Ajie Pramudita
Description: Sebuah karya lagu yang diciptakan oleh seorang penderita OCD yang ingin bebas dari belenggu pikiran yang mengganggunya selama ini.

title: LIVE AND LEARN
creator: Muhammad Raul A. F. D.
Description: Sebuah karya lagu yang diciptakan oleh seorang penderita OCD yang ingin bebas dari belenggu pikiran yang mengganggunya selama ini.

title: Loneliness
creator: Panna Vidya Taruna
Description: Jangan remehkan rasa kesepian. Jika dipendam terlalu lama, lama-kelamaan hal ini akan mencekikmu secara perlahan.
